sentences.en: A mineral consisting of titanium dioxide in crystalline form; occurs in metamorphic and plutonic rocks and is a major source of titanium.
sentences.cn: 一种含有二氧化的矿物，呈晶体状，见于变质岩和火成岩中，是的主要来源。

sentences.en: It provides collection of images of minerals in thin sections, and microtextures of plutonic , volcanic and metamorphic rocks.
sentences.cn: 网站提供了大量的矿物薄截面、火成岩、火山岩以及变质岩显微质地的图片。

sentences.en: Plutonic rocks consisting of pyroxene, pigeonite and plagioclase , the source of cumulate eucrites.
sentences.cn: 包括辉石、易变辉石 、 和斜长石等火成岩, 来自于推积性的喷发.

sentences.en: The rise of plutonic granitic magma was the basic heat source generating strong dynamometamorphism and one of the main factors that influenced dynamic deformation.
sentences.cn: 深成花岗岩浆隆升作用是发生强烈动力变质作用的基本热源并影响动力变形作用的主要因素之一。

sentences.en: This belt is bounded on the north by a group of large plutonic masses.
sentences.cn: 该带的北部被一群大规模的深成岩体所限.

sentences.en: Trap rock is a form of plutonic igneous rock.
Zhuizi Mountain compound plutonic complex consists of seven compound plutonic rock theies.
sentences.cn: 锥子山复式深成杂岩体由7个复杂深成岩体组成.

words.tran_cn: 冥王星的；冥界的；深成岩的

trans.tran_en: (of igneous rocks) derived from magma that has cooled and solidified below the surface of the earth
